description: Penny is no stranger to the pages of this site, and her bratty attitude is something most of us have come to enjoy about her. Derrick, on the other hand puts this smart ass whore in her place quickly. She makes several attempts at trying to push his buttons, yet all it does is get her in more trouble, which is where she wants to be anyway. She feels like she is manipulating the situation, then he opens his bag of tricks and tames this back talking whore.
title: Bratty Bitch Beatdown
